transfer-tokens.wrong-symbols: There are some wrong symbols in field
transfer-tokens.length-max-symbols: Length should be not longer then 12 symbols

generate-key-pair.title: Generate key pair
generate-key-pair.upper-block: Please back up the private key displayed below in multiple safe location before continuing. You should make more than one copy and keep all copies in separate secure locations. If you use an external storage device such as a USB stick, make sure to safely eject the device before continuing.
generate-key-pair.lower-block: There is no way to recover your private key. You must save it right now or you will be unable to access your EOS tokens when the sale ends.

delegate.tooltip: Transfer Off: owner retains staking control and voting rights. Transfer On: New account gains staking control and voting rights.
delegate.account-missing: Account with this name is missing

dialogs.account-not-found: Account with this key was not found
dialogs.you-have: You have to install Scatter Plugin .
dialogs.you-have-scatter: You have to install Scatter Plugin .
dialogs.you-have-eos-plugin: You have to install EOS Plugin .
dialogs.select-account-text: Select the account and authorization you wish to use for this identity. You can only select one at time. On almost all cases upi should select your @active account.
dialogs.select-info: Select the account and authorization you wish to use for this identity. You can only select one at time. On almost all cases upi should select your @active account.
dialogs.transaction-wil-be-sent: YOUR TRANSACTION WILL BE SENT TO THE NETWORK AFTERWARDS

popup.cookies: To ensure your safety and to provide you with relevant information, we use cookies, and also collect data via Google Analytics.

dialog-change-last-network.header: Log in to the latest network?
dialog-change-last-network.description: There are didn't choose accounts on current network. Would you like switch back or logout?

undelegate.account-missing: Account with this name is missing

permission.authority-is-required: Authority  is required: Public Key or Actor@Permission

create-account.name-may-include: Name may only include the characters 12345abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz

other.contract-viewed: The ricardian contract may be viewed in the Scatter approval prompt.
other.bid-on-name-info-bar: The bid must be 10% greater then the previous bid. By executing this action you are agreeing to the EOS constitution and this actions associated ricardian contract
other.name-settings: Name should start from dot and may only include the characters 12345abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz
other.claim-warning: By executing this action you are agreeing to the EOS constitution and this action's associated ricardian contract. The ricardian contract may be viewed in the Scatter approval prompt.

login.data: EosWebWallet does not store Your data. We cannot access accounts, recover keys, reset passwords or reverse transactions. Private key info is stored locally by You.

info.text1: EosWebWallet offers a free, open-source, client-oriented interface for transferring EOS & Tokens. Private key info is stored locally by you. You are responsible for your security. EosWebWallet is not the creator of, and does not have any control over, any of the Digital Assets that software program allows you to use.
info.text2: In case you have noticed a vulnerability in the software, please inform us at support@eoswebwallet.io

common.agree-constitution: By executing this action you are agreeing to the EOS constitution and this actions associated

info.transferTokens: Send EOS and tokens to one or more users directly without intermediaries using EosWebWallet. Be careful when entering the address of the recipient, as the transaction can not be withdrawn in case of an error. You can also import a CSV file with recipient data to transfer digital assets.
info.generateKeyPairs: You can generate a pair of Your keys to access Your account. These keys are not stored on the server and are displayed only in Your browser. Your private key can not be restored if You lose it. Make a back-up and keep all copies in separate secure locations.

manageAccount.delegate: The section allows you to manage your account. Do not make any changes if you are not sure of the correctness of your actions. You can get or delete permissions to another account, as well as request permission from other users for additional operations.You may as well define named permission levels each of which can be derived from higher level named permissions by specifying a threshold multi-signature check consisting of keys and/or named permission levels of other accounts.

manageVoting.setProxy: The section allows You to vote for certain block producers and perform a number of actions with them.By becoming a proxy you can vote on behalf of others who set you as their proxy.By resigning a proxy you will no longer vote on behalf of others who set you as their proxy. Vote weight changes immediately. All accounts that had you set as a proxy will no longer have any votes.If you had previously registered your Proxy Info, please click 'Unregister Producer' to keep the proxy database clean.
manageVoting.createProxy: The section allows You to vote for certain block producers and perform a number of actions with them.By becoming a proxy you can vote on behalf of others who set you as their proxy.By resigning a proxy you will no longer vote on behalf of others who set you as their proxy. contracts.interactWithContract: You may directly apply to the contract, as well as upload your contracts or ABI using a special interface.

info.findAccount: You may search for the required account by entering the account name or public key.
info.createAccount: You may create an account for another user, giving him the right to manage and the right to vote, or leaving these options with You. When creating an account, you need to allocate additional resources: CPU, NET, RAM.

other.setPrivilege: The section allows You to manage CPU, NET and RAM, endow privileges to the account, set account & global limits, cancel transactions with mandatory delay in case of an error, claim rewards as well as bet on a unique readable name.

our-features.title: Our Features
our-features.description: Currently we have added the next features:
our-features.bottom: Do you want to add other features? Write us in telegram channel.

faq.title: FAQ

faq-sections.question: How do you store my keys?
faq-sections.answer: We don't store your keys, they located in your Browser local storage, so we don't know them and can't restore. Remember: We do not store any user private data.

faq-sections.question: Can I stake/unstake my EOS in your wallet?
faq-sections.answer: Yes, you can perform these actions also as others: vote, delegate, create new accounts and much more. Just log in your account.

faq-sections.question: Do you have a mobile application?
faq-sections.answer: No, currently we have created only a web browser application, but you can use on your mobile devices also.

faq-sections.question: Do you support Airdrops?
faq-sections.answer: We support all major EOS airdrops, contact us in telegram if we missed the good one.

faq-sections.question: I am developer, can I use your code?
faq-sections.answer: Yes, we have created open source software, so you can fork or update it.

faq-sections.question: Can I restore my EOS wallet in other device?
faq-sections.answer: Yes, you can restore your wallet in any device. You should only know your Private keys or be logged in Scatter.

faq-sections.question: Houston, we have a problem. Who can help me?
faq-sections.answer: In case you have problems in connection to our wallet, work with accounts, managing your EOS and others - just contact us via telegram, we would be happy to assist you.

faq.bottom: Visualization of the required sections can be found here.
